DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study include patient young 18 years-old initial pacemaker implantation due advance AVB . The design study involve follow stage : 1 . Screening enrollment : patient select consecutively ambulatory care Institution database Surgical Unity Cardiac Pacing ; 2 . Clinical laboratory evaluation : patient history , clinical evaluation , serum level neurohormonal inflammatory biomarkers heart failure , clinical laboratory investigation autoimmune rheumatic disease , quality life ( SF-36 , CHQ-PF50 ) six-minute walk test ; 3 . Evaluation ventricular function cardiac synchronicity : Tissue Doppler ( TDI ) real-time three-dimensional echocardiography ( RT3DE ) ; 4 . Follow-up : patient monitor 24 month . The main end-points : - Clinical functional change ( NYHA functional class ) - Heart failure hospitalization - Quality life - Overall cardiac mortality - Cardiac resynchronization therapy heart transplantation
